title: Installer doesnt function properly
body: I try to run the installer but it pops up asking if I am sure i want to cancel instillation, if i click no it restarts and just goes through in the same loop, if if i click yes it ends the installer. i have tried searching for info regarding this and have yet to turn up a solution. Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: This is a strange issue that I'm unfamiliar with, and curious if League is being downloaded from the official source.  Make sure to download the current installer [here](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)!  If you still have any issues let me know and with any additional information possible!
